title: ghd Unplugged Styler ― 1" Cordless Flat Iron Hair Straightener, Professional Travel Straightening Iron with Heat-Resistant Case That Fits in Your Handbag, USB-C Charging for 20-Minutes of Use ― Black
features: STYLE YOUR HAIR WHEREVER YOU ARE ― ghd's cordless hair flat iron delivers up to 20 minutes of continuous ghd hair styling tool performance depending on your hair and styling habits. For quick, sleek, and smooth hair on the go - anytime and anywhere making it the ideal travel hair styling tool and appliance that empowers the feeling of a good hair day no matter where you are.

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT ― Portable and powerful, the ghd Unplugged hot tool flat iron is 47% lighter, 30% smaller, and combines dual-zone ceramic heaters to guarantee quick-sleek and smooth healthy-looking hair on the go using the optimum hair styling temperature of 365ºF. Any hotter damages the hair, any cooler and the result is compromised.

EASY CHARGING WITH SMART BATTERY ― Never wonder about your charge with the 5-bar battery life indicator on this ghd hair straightener. Charge between each styling session to optimize battery life using USB-C compatible devices that fully charges your Unplugged hair styler in 120 minutes.

FLIGHT FRIENDLY ― The ghd Unplugged flat iron hair tool is approved for safe in-cabin traveling and in carry-on luggage. Complimented by a heat-resistant styling case for protection so you can take your hair styling tool anywhere in the world.

FAST HEAT UP & COOL DOWN ― The ghd Unplugged flat iron straightening hair tool reaches the optimum temperature of 365ºF in 45 seconds and cools down in 15 minutes for seamless use on the go. It automatically switches off after 3 minutes of inactivity to preserve battery life.
description: With guaranteed performance of a regular-sized ghd flat iron, in a portable, flight-friendly design, enjoy 20 minutes of cordless styling* for a touch-up or style switch. Hybrid co-lithium technology maintains the safer-for-hair temperature of 365°F and high-gloss plates ensure snag-free styling. plug the included dual-ended USB-C cable and power adapter into a power outlet, laptop, or car until all five battery charge lights illuminate and stop flashing (approximately two hours) - Disconnect from the cable and enjoy up to 20 minutes of styling. - Cannot be used while charging - The ultimate style switch tool. Style in 1" sections to go from day to night, straight to waves, etc. - Unplugged Cordless Styler shuts off automatically after three minutes of non-usage to preserve the battery life

ghd is good hair day. With over 350 beauty awards, ghd is a global leader in high-end professional hair tools and UK’s number one recommended styling brand. Used by 200,000 hairstylists around the world and sold in 30+ countries.
